results.title: Astroworld Disaster Rekindles Fears About Music Festival Safety
results.abstract: The concert industry notes that serious problems are still rare, but over the years a number of deadly stampedes have shown the inherent dangers of big, excited crowds.

results.title: Donors Withhold Gifts to Protest Changes at Hamptons Sculpture Garden
results.abstract: Some patrons of the LongHouse Reserve are upset that its veteran director was let go, but the board says it needed new leadership to expand the garden into a museum with a broader mission.

results.title: Lee Maracle, Combative Indigenous Author, Dies at 71

results.title: Etel Adnan, Lebanese American Author and Artist, Dies at 96
results.abstract: Her novel about a kidnapping in Lebanon has become a classic of war literature. She was in her 80s when her art started to draw international attention.
